Posts.Content: Hello, I am Pam Labelle, and I am a Breast Cancer Survivor. I am new to the site and wanted to share an article I think could be useful to women around the U.S. The article is called: 186 Centers offering Free Mammograms & Free Breast Cancer Screening Across the U.S. Link: http://www.ezhealthmd.com/free-mammo...cer-screening/ Let me know what you guys think!
Posts.Title: Great article generating Breast Cancer Awareness
